title: How to Print Web Pages With Firefox

steps.headline: Browse to find the page you'd like to print.
Click the orange "Firefox" button from the upper right corner of your screen.
Click the "Print" option.
steps.description: Click right on the word portion, when the item is highlighted.

steps.headline: Select the printer from the "Printer:Name" drop-down button on the selection bar.
Select how many copies you want from the dialog box's "Copies" area.
Select how much of the webpage you'd like to print OR leave the default set as ALL to print out all portions of the page.
steps.description: You also have the option of printing out separate pages of the webpage, and when you've selected words/phrases on the screen, you'll also have the "Selection" printing enabled for your convenience.

text: Open your Mozilla Firefox browser.  Browse to find the page you'd like to print.  Click the orange "Firefox" button from the upper right corner of your screen.  Click the "Print" option. Click right on the word portion, when the item is highlighted. Select the printer from the "Printer:Name" drop-down button on the selection bar.  Select how many copies you want from the dialog box's "Copies" area.  Select how much of the webpage you'd like to print OR leave the default set as ALL to print out all portions of the page. You also have the option of printing out separate pages of the webpage, and when you've selected words/phrases on the screen, you'll also have the "Selection" printing enabled for your convenience.
sentences: Browse to find the page you'd like to print.
Click the orange "Firefox" button from the upper right corner of your screen.
Click right on the word portion, when the item is highlighted.
Select the printer from the "Printer:Name" drop-down button on the selection bar.
Select how many copies you want from the dialog box's "Copies" area.
Select how much of the webpage you'd like to print OR leave the default set as ALL to print out all portions of the page.
You also have the option of printing out separate pages of the webpage, and when you've selected words/phrases on the screen, you'll also have the "Selection" printing enabled for your convenience.
